text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: llig ̇ - ag ̇ - ifka rbbi tawuri - ad ihiyyan s - rrh ̣ mt - ns , ar - gis - ntzayad bla - da - ntrmay .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: naggug zg ̇ - kullu ma - igan lɛib intln iššh ̣ ššamn . ur - a - nzzray kra f - yan s - tkrkas ula - da - ntbddal awal n - rbbi s - lg ̇ ʷšš , walaynni ar - bdda - nttini lh ̣ qq i - kullu mddn g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi , baš ad - issann g ̇ - uwl - nsn izd afulki a - nskar .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: ig ̇ - sul - idl lh ̬ bar - ad ifulkin , idl g ̇ ir f - willi sul tyawhlaknin .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: ntni ur - uminn ašku iblis lli - ih ̣ kamn ddunit - ad issbukd ̣ lɛaql - nsn a - ur - z ̣ rn tifawt l - lh ̬ bar l - lmjd l - lmasih ̣ lli - igan s ̣ s ̣ urt n - rbbi .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: ašku urd f - ih ̬ f - nng ̇ a - f - a - ntbrrah ̣ , walaynni ar - ntbrrah ̣ f - yasuɛ lmasih ̣ , ar - nmala is - iga ntta siditnng ̇ , ng nkkʷni ih ̬ ddamn - nnun s - ism l - lmasih ̣ .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: ašku rbbi lli - innan « ra - di - tisfiw tifawt zg ̇ - wammas n - tillas , » nttan a - ifawn g ̇ - uwlawn - nng ̇ g ̇ ilad s - tifawt n - twassna l - lmjd - ns lli - d - ibann g ̇ - uwdm l - lmasih ̣ .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: imma lknz - ad , nusi - t g ̇ - tmkilin n - wakal , baš a - itban izd rbbi a - mi - tlla - th ̣ kimt - ad itjhhdn urd nkkʷni .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: iggut mad - ag ̇ - itkrhun walaynni illa - bdda mad - ag ̇ - ittirin . ar - bahra - ntrfufun walaynni ur - a - nlkkm lhalak .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: nusi - bdda lmut n - yasuɛ f - ddat - nng ̇ baš a - ttban ula tudrt n - yasuɛ g ̇ - ddat - nng ̇ .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: ašku kullu mah ̣ dd nsul ar - ag ̇ - n - dh ̣ ayn mddn i - lmut f - ssibt n - yasuɛ , baš a - ttbayyan tudrt n - yasuɛ g ̇ - ddat - nng ̇ lli - itmtatn .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - a - ntmmag ̇ d - lmut baš a - tet ̣ t ̣ afm kunni tudrt .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: nssn mayad bahra : rbbi lli - d - issnkrn siditnng ̇ yasuɛ rad - ag ̇ - issnkr ula nkkʷni d - yasuɛ , yawi - ag ̇ didun s - dars .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: kullu mayd ijrrun g ̇ ilad , ar - ijrru f - ssibt - nnun baš a - tzayd lbaraka n - rbbi ar - ttruh ̣ kigan d - mddn , igatn bahra g ̇ willi - ti - tškarnin ibayyn lmjd n - rbbi s - uggʷar .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: mayan a - f - ur - akkʷ - a - ntrmay . wah ̬ h ̬ a da - ttd ̣ ɛaf ddat - nng ̇ , ar - itdus - uwl - nng ̇ ass f - wass .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: ašku tanukmut - ad ifssusn g ̇ - a - nzray ussan - ad drusnin , rad - ag ̇ - tggʷru s - lmjd idumn lli - bahra - yugʷrn kullu g ̇ ayad .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: hati ur - a - stt - ntawi g ̇ - maylli nz ̣ rra , walaynni ar - tt - ntawi g ̇ - maylli ur - a - iz ̣ rra yan . ašku maylli nz ̣ rra ur - ra - iqama , imma maylli ur - a - nz ̣ rra rad - bdda - yili .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: nssn mayad , ig ̇ - ttyawhlak - th ̬ iyyamt lli - igan ddat - nng ̇ n - ddunit - ad , rad - ag ̇ - ifk rbbi yat - tzdg ̇ t g ̇ - ignna . rad - ag ̇ - ifk yat - tgmmi lli - ur - ityawskarn s - ifassn n - bnadm , rad - bdda - tdum .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad g ̇ - sul - nqama g ̇ - ddunit - ad ar - nnddr , nz ̣ uz ̣ d ̣ a - nls ddat - nng ̇ n - ignna .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: ar - nttiri a - stt - nls a - ur - nqama bla tazdg ̇ t .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: ašku mah ̣ dd nqama g ̇ - th ̬ iyyamt - ad ar - nnddr s - tag ̇ uft . ur - nnig ̇ is - nra a - nkkis tah ̬ iyyamt - ad , walaynni nra a - nls tazdg ̇ t yad ̣ ni , baš a - nbddl ma - itmtatn s - ma - rad - bdda - iddr .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: rbbi a - fllanng ̇ - iqs ̣ adn mayad , ifk - ag ̇ rruh ̣ - ns baš a - nissan is - rad - ag ̇ - issafu kullu maylli - s - ag ̇ - inna .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - a - bdda - nzzɛam ulawn - nng ̇ , ašku nssn is - d - naggug zg ̇ - siditnng ̇ g ̇ ilad g ̇ - sul - nzdg ̇ g ̇ - ddat - ad .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: imma nkkʷni ar - tt - ntawi g ̇ - maylli - s - numn , urd g ̇ - maylli nz ̣ rra .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: mayan ad - ag ̇ - izzɛamn bahra . niri a - nfl ddat - ad , nruh ̣ dar siditnng ̇ .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: walaynni ig ̇ - nqama g ̇ - ddat - ad ng ̇ d ig ̇ - tt - nfl , rad - bdda - nskar f - a - nrd ̣ u siditnng ̇ .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .

In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: nazn - n dids gʷmatnng ̇ lli - talg ̇ n aytmatn g ̇ - imnaggarn kullutn f - ssibt n - tbrrah ̣ t - ns l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: nra a - nsslkm lamant - ad iggutn bla ginng ̇ iškka yan f - mamnk a - ra - tlkm .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: nrar - bdda lɛaql baš a - nskar afulki g ̇ - iz ̣ ri n - siditnng ̇ ula win mddn .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: nazn - n didsn yan gʷmatnng ̇ yad ̣ ni , nz ̣ ra mnnawt - twal mnšk a - bahra - ittiri a - iɛawn wiyyad ̣ . d - nttan , llig ̇ isfld f - ma - tnawlm ifulki , yiri s - uggʷar ad - awn - gis - iɛawn .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: imma tit ̣ us , iga asmun - inu ar - didi - ith ̬ dam f - ssibt - nnun . imma aytmatnng ̇ yad ̣ ni , ntni gan imazann n - imnaggarn ar - itban lmjd l - lmasih ̣ g ̇ - twuri lli - skarn .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: mlat - asn mnšk a - tn - ttirim , baš ad - issann kullu imnaggarn n - aytmatn is - tsthllam g ̇ mklli - kʷn - ntalg ̇ g ̇ - darsn .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: ur - iyi - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a ad - zaydg ̇ arag ̇ - awn - in f - lmɛawnt lli - ra - nawi i - imz ̣ layn g ̇ - urušalim ,

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: ašku ssng ̇ is - tram bahra a - tfkm kra . hati ulg ̇ g ̇ - kʷn g ̇ - dar ayt - makiduniyya inig ̇ - asn : « asggʷas ayad s - ujadn ayt - ah ̬ aya ad - ɛawnn » ayllig ̇ iggut g ̇ - ayt - makiduniyya ma - iwrrin ira a - ifk kra llig ̇ sfldn f - ma - tnawlm kunni s - nniyt - nnun .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad uzng ̇ - awn - in aytmatn - ad baš a - tujadm g ̇ mklli - asn - nnig ̇ , iban gigun is - tsthllam maylli fllawn nnig ̇ .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: mayan a - f - swangmg ̇ is - ra - yaf ig ̇ - d ̣ albg ̇ aytmatn - ad a - yyi - n - zwurn s - darun , baš ad - jjujadn tawafka lli - s - tnnam ra - stti - taznm . g ̇ mkan a - s - ra - stt - in - afg ̇ nkki tujad s - lh ̬ at ̣ r - nnun urd s - bzzez .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: ašku wanna - n - iluh ̣ n amud idrusn , idrus ma - ra - imgr . imma wanna - n - iluh ̣ n amud iggutn , iggut ma - ra - imgr .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: rbbi iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - kʷn - ibark s - tmih ̬ ar - ns ggutnin baš ad - awn - yili kullu ma - th ̣ tajjam , yili - awn - dag ̇ ma - s - a - ttɛawanm g ̇ - kullu ma - igan afulki .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: g ̇ mklli ityaran : « ar - issukut lbarakat - ns f - imz ̣ lad ̣ . ur - ra - sar - ttmmu lh ̣ nant - ns . »

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: iggut ma - ra - t - iškr f - lmɛawnt - nnun , ašku ra - srs - tmlm is - a - tskarm s - lh ̬ bar ifulkin l - lmasih ̣ ar - ttirim a - ttɛawanm imz ̣ layn - an ula kullu mddn .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: imma g ̇ ilad , a - bahra - nškr rbbi lli - ag ̇ - d - ifkan ma - yugʷrn kullu iswingimn n - bnadm .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad ra - kʷn - d ̣ albg ̇ nkki bulus s - ism l - lmasih ̣ lli - bdda - ih ̣ nnan is ̣ br d - kud yan , ašku ar - flla - ttinin kra n - mddn is - d ̣ ɛfg ̇ g ̇ akud nna - darun - llig ̇ , šqug ̇ didun g ̇ akud nna - fllawn - aggugg ̇ .

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: walaynni ra - kʷn - d ̣ albg ̇ a - tskrm ma - kʷn - d - iqqann , baš a - ur - iyi - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a ad - didun - šqug ̇ g ̇ akud nna - n - uškig ̇ , g ̇ mklli - yyi - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a ad - šqug ̇ d - kra n - mddn lli - g ̇ alnin is - a - nskar s - ma - ittiri ih ̬ f - nng ̇ .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: wah ̬ h ̬ a nzdg ̇ g ̇ - ddunit - ad , ur - a - ntmmag ̇ s - g ̇ aylli - s - a - tmmag ̇ n mddn n - ddunit - ad .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: imqlad lli - s - a - ntmmag ̇ nkkʷni ur - gin win ddunit - ad , walaynni tlla - gisn - th ̣ kimt itjhhdn n - rbbi a - srsn - nssd ̣ ar lbruj dusnin .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: imma kunni , ig ̇ - tram a - tskarm kullu s - tnbad ̣ in l - lmasih ̣ , nujad nkkʷni a - nh ̣ kam f - wanna ur - srsnt - iskarn .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: walaynni kunni ar - tz ̣ rram g ̇ ir ma - illan g ̇ - brra . is - darun - illa ma - ittinin iga ah ̬ ddam l - lmasih ̣ ? illa fllas a - ur - ittu mayad : ula nkkʷni nga ih ̬ ddamn l - lmasih ̣ .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: ur - akkʷ - rad - h ̣ šmg ̇ , wah ̬ h ̬ a da - sawalg ̇ bahra f - mamnk ad - ag ̇ - iz ̣ li siditnng ̇ ad - awn - nmala ma - kʷn - d - iqqann a - ti - tskarm . ašku iz ̣ li - ag ̇ urd f - a - kʷn - nhlk walaynni f - a - kʷn - nɛawn .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: a - ur - tg ̇ alm is - rig ̇ a - kʷn - in - ssiwidg ̇ s - tbratin - inu .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: illa ma - ittinin « g ̇ akud nna - yag ̇ - d - yura bulus itjhhd išqu didnng ̇ , walaynni g ̇ akud nna - d - darnng ̇ - yuška id ̣ ɛf ur - issin mamnk a - isawal . »

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: imma wan mddn - an , illa fllasn ad - issann mayad : g ̇ akud nna - n - darun - nuška ar - bdda - nskar kullu s - mklli - awn - in - nenna llig ̇ - d - naggug .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: ur - nzɛm a - nssngadda ih ̬ fawn - nng ̇ d - kra n - mddn lli - talg ̇ nin ih ̬ f - nsn , ula ra - nini is - tn - nuf . ašku llig ̇ a - ttinin i - ngratsn « kra yuf kra » ng ̇ d « kra yugʷr kra » iban fllasn is - ur - fhimn yat .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: imma nkkʷni ur - ra - n - ntyaggal s - ma - n - fllanng ̇ - yaggugn , walaynni ra - ng g ̇ mklli nga g ̇ - twuri - ad - ag ̇ - ifka rbbi lli - s - ag ̇ - n - yiwi ula s - darun .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: ur - nri a - nssurf iwtta s - illi ur - ag ̇ - ifki rbbi . walaynni ifka - yag ̇ kra g ̇ - darun , ašku nkkʷni a - izwarn is - n - nmudda nsslkm - awn - in lh ̬ bar ifulkin l - lmasih ̣ .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: ur - akkʷ - a - ntalg ̇ ih ̬ f - nng ̇ f - kra - ur - nskir ula f - mad - skrn wiyyad ̣ , walaynni ar - n - ntrju g ̇ - igr n - darun a - gis - tigat - tmgra llig ̇ a - ttzayadm g ̇ - liman .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - s - ra - nddu tigira , ar - ntbrrah ̣ s - lh ̬ bar ifulkin g ̇ - tmizar yad ̣ ni aggugn - in fllawn , bla - da - ntalg ̇ ih ̬ f - nng ̇ f - ma - ityawskarn g ̇ - igran n - mddn yad ̣ ni .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: g ̇ mklli ityaran : « wanna iran a - yalg ̇ , yalg ̇ siditnng ̇ . »

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: ašku urd yan ird ̣ an ih ̬ f - ns a - ra - ityawqbal , walaynni yan f - ird ̣ a sidis .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: s ̣ brat didi ig ̇ - iyi - tz ̣ ram ar - sawalg ̇ imikk zund yan iffug ̇ n ih ̬ f - ns .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: ts ̣ brm didi ašku ar - kʷn - ttirig ̇ s - tayri n - rbbi , fkg ̇ - kʷn i - lmasih ̣ zund yat - tslit lli - g ̇ - ur - illi kra l - lɛib , baš a - ur - tilim i - kra n - yan yad ̣ ni .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: ksud ̣ g ̇ a - kʷn - ijllu kra n - yan f - iswingimn - nnun g ̇ mklli - stt - izzri - ulgmmad ̣ s - tkrkas - ns f - immatnng ̇ h ̣ uwwa . iksad ̣ g ̇ a - twrrim zg ̇ - tayri is ̣ fan lli - s - ttin tkkam ar - ttirim lmasih ̣ s - nniyt - nnun .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: ašku ar - tsflidm s - wanna - n - darun - yuškan ar - itbrrah ̣ s - kra n - yasuɛ ur - igi yasuɛ lli - s - awn - nbrrh ̣ nkkʷni . hati ar - ttqbalm wanna - yawn - yakkan kra n - rruh ̣ ur - igi rruh ̣ lli - tqblm yadlli . ar - ttamnm wanna - yawn - in - itawin kra l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin ur - igi lh ̬ bar ifulkin lli - s - tumnm f - imi - nng ̇ .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: walaynni irwas - iyi is - ur - iyi - akkʷ - ufn mddn - an lli - tgam d - irqqasn hiyyanin .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: wah ̬ h ̬ a da - ttinin kra n - mddn ur - ssing ̇ ad - sawlg ̇ , ha - yyi ssng ̇ bahra ma - yʷg ̇ z ̣ ann . ula kunni kullukn tz ̣ ram mayan g ̇ - kullu ma - nskr g ̇ - gratun .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: g ̇ akud llig ̇ - awn - in - iwig ̇ lh ̬ bar ifulkin n - rbbi ur - jju - zgigun - d ̣ albg ̇ iqaridn . udrg ̇ i - ih ̬ f - inu baš - a - tallm kunni ih ̬ fawn - nnun . is - iɛib mayn skrg ̇ ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: g ̇ - uwssan - an ar - tamz ̣ g ̇ mad - h ̣ tajjag ̇ zg ̇ - imnaggarn yad ̣ ni , ar - šttag ̇ zg ̇ - lh ̬ ir - nsn baš ad - awn - h ̬ dmg ̇ .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: imma g ̇ akud llig ̇ lkmg ̇ f - kra g ̇ - darun ur - d ̣ albg ̇ yan f - yat , ašku aytmatn lli - n - uškanin zg ̇ - makiduniyya iwin - iyi - n kullu mad - h ̣ tajjag ̇ . g ̇ mklli skrg ̇ g ̇ - uwssan - an a - rad - bdda - skarg ̇ . ur - sar - ra - zgigun - d ̣ albg ̇ yat i - ih ̬ f - inu .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: s - lh ̣ qq l - lmasih ̣ lli - gigi - illan , ur - ra - yiz ̣ d ̣ ar yan g ̇ - tmazirt n - ah ̬ aya kullutt a - yyi - issfssa f - wawal - ad .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: mah ̬ ayllig ̇ - awn - sawlg ̇ g ̇ mkad ? is - ur - dari - tɛzzam ? rbbi a - issnn mamnk a - dari - tɛzzam bahra .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - rad - bdda - skarg ̇ , baš a - ur - iz ̣ d ̣ arn kra n - mddn ad - talg ̇ n ih ̬ f - nsn ar - ttinin izd zund nkkʷni ad - skarn .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: ašku wan mddn - an urd irqqasn n - s ̣ s ̣ ah ̣ t ad - gan , walaynni gan ih ̬ ddamn img ̇ d ̣ arn ar - tbddaln ssift - nsn baš ad - rwasn irqqasn l - lmasih ̣ .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: ur - igi g ̇ ayad lɛjb , ašku šit ̣ an ula nttan ar - itbddal ssift - ns baš a - irwas yal - lmalak ifawn .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: a - ur - ntɛjjab ig ̇ - nz ̣ ra ih ̬ ddamn - ns ar - tbddaln ssift - nsn baš ad - rwasn ih ̬ ddamn n - ufulki . imma ntni rad - asn - yili mad - asn - igan .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: rad - awn - dag ̇ - inig ̇ a - ur - tg ̇ alm is - ffug ̇ g ̇ ih ̬ f - inu . walaynni ig ̇ - sul - gigun - illa ma - ig ̇ aln g ̇ mkan , rad - as - inig ̇ a - yyi - iqbl zund yan inufln , baš ad - alg ̇ g ̇ ih ̬ f - inu ula nkki yan imikk .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: urd awal n - siditnng ̇ ayd - awn - ttinig ̇ g ̇ ilad , hati rad - alg ̇ g ̇ ih ̬ f - inu zund yan inufln .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: ggutn mddn ar - talg ̇ n ih ̬ fawn - nsn f - mad - asn - illan g ̇ - ddunit - ad . hati rad - sawlg ̇ ula nkki g ̇ mkan ,

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: ašku ar - kʷn - itɛjab a - tts ̣ barm d - inafaln kunni lli - igan ih ̬ f - nnun d - ayt - lɛaql .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: imma kunni a - id - siditsn rad - awn - inig ̇ , skarat afulki i - ih ̬ ddamn - nnun bla - da - tn - tssiwidm . ašku tssnm is - illa yan g ̇ - ignna , iga siditsn ig siditun ula kunni , ur - a - iskar s - uwdmawn .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: awal - inu iggʷran iga - t : dusat g ̇ - siditnng ̇ s - tdwast - ns itjhhdn .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: asiyat kullu imqlad n - rbbi baš a - tiz ̣ d ̣ arm a - ttd ̣ ad ̣ d ̣ am lh ̣ ilat n - iblis .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: ašku urd bnadm a - d - ntmmag ̇ , walaynni larwah ̣ ʷh ̬ šnnin ula ljnun tjhhdnin ula ssult ̣ at n - ignwan ula lquwwat n - tillas n - ddunit - ad .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: mayan a - f - rad - awn - inig ̇ , asiyat kullu imqlad n - rbbi , baš a - tiz ̣ d ̣ arm a - tbiddm tzgam g ̇ - wass yʷh ̬ šnn , tmmag ̇ m ar isiggʷra sul tbiddm .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: biddat g ̇ ilad tzgam . bkisat s - tagʷst l - ‹ lh ̣ qq › , tgm i - idmarn - nnun abannk n - ‹ rrd ̣ a n - rbbi › ,

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: tqqnm i - id ̣ arn - nnun turz ̣ iyin n - ‹ zzɛamt s - tbrrah ̣ t l - lh ̬ bar n - sslamt › ,

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: tasim tamsntlt n - ‹ ttiqa g ̇ - rbbi › lli - iz ̣ d ̣ arn a - n - fllawn - th ̣ s ̣ ar kullu iz ̣ d ̣ kan jddrnin lli - s - a - kʷn - ikkat iblis .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: gat f - ih ̬ f - nnun asddul n - ‹ ujnjm › , tamz ̣ m g ̇ - ufus - nnun taz ̣ z ̣ it n - ‹ wawal n - rbbi › lli - awn - ifka rruh ̣ lqudus ,

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: ar - ttz ̣ allam g ̇ - kraygatt luqt g ̇ mklli - awn - imala rruh ̣ lqudus , ar - ttd ̣ alabm rbbi f - kraygatt kra , trarm lɛaql bla - da - ttrmaym , ar - bdda - ti - ttd ̣ albm a - itɛawan kullu willi iz ̣ li ad - gn wins .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: d ̣ albat rbbi flla ula nkki , ad - iyi - iml ma - rad - inig ̇ g ̇ akud nna - sawalg ̇ s - mddn , baš a - tbrrah ̣ g ̇ s - zzɛamt f - lh ̬ bar ifulkin i - willi ur - jju - fllas - sfldnin .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: hati g ̇ ilad ‹ amazan g ̇ - iskraf › ad - gig ̇ f - ssibt l - lh ̬ bar - ad . d ̣ albat rbbi a - yyi - iɛawn ad - sawlg ̇ s - zzɛamt g ̇ mklli - yyi - d - iqqann .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad , uzng ̇ - awn - in tih ̬ ikus . iga gʷmatnng ̇ iɛzzan , ig ah ̬ ddam ifulkin n - siditnng ̇ . rad - awn - yini kullu f - mamnk ad - gig ̇ ula mad - skarg ̇ .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: mayad a - f - awn - t - in - uzng ̇ , baš a - tissanm mamnk a - nga , izzɛam ulawn - nnun .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ad - awn - tili sslamt ay - aytma kullukn . d ̣ albg ̇ rbbi babatnng ̇ d - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ ad - awn - ifk a - tth ̣ nnum i - ngratun ar - ttamnm bahra .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: a - tili lbaraka i - kullu willi ittirin siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ s - tayri idumn .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: zg ̇ - bulus d - timutaws , ih ̬ ddamn l - lmasih ̣ yasuɛ , i - kullu imz ̣ layn l - lmasih ̣ yasuɛ g ̇ - tmdint n - filibbi ula ingabaln d - imɛawann - nnun .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ad - awn - tili lbaraka d - sslamt zg ̇ - rbbi babatnng ̇ d - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: ar - tškarg ̇ rbbi - nu g ̇ akud nna - fllawn - swingimg ̇ .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: ar - tfrah ̣ g ̇ g ̇ akud nna - ti - td ̣ alabg ̇ f - ssibt - nnun kullukn ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: ašku ar - didi - ttmɛawanm g ̇ - twuri l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin zg ̇ - wass amzwaru sul s - g ̇ assad .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: hati ssng ̇ mayad bahra : rbbi lli - gigun - igran afulki ra - t - issafaw ard ikmml g ̇ - wass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - iwrri lmasih ̣ yasuɛ .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: iqqan - iyi - d a - gigun - swingimg ̇ kullukn g ̇ mkan , ašku usig ̇ - kʷn - bdda g ̇ - uwl - inu . llig ̇ a - th ̣ amag ̇ f - lh ̬ bar ifulkin ar - t - zzgag ̇ g ̇ - uwlawn n - mddn , ula g ̇ ilad g ̇ - tyamaz ̣ g ̇ ilig ̇ g ̇ - iskraf , tkšmm didi kullukn g ̇ - lbaraka n - twuri - ad .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: rbbi a - flla - igan inigi , yissan mamnk a - yyi - inqqa - umarg - nnun , ar - kʷn - ttirig ̇ s - tayri l - lmasih ̣ yasuɛ .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: imma g ̇ ilad ar - td ̣ alabg ̇ rbbi ad - awn - issigat bahra lh ̣ nant n - ingratun , ifk - awn a - tissanm kullu ma - igan win lh ̣ qq ar - tat ̣ t ̣ um ma - išwan zg ̇ - ma - yʷh ̬ šnn .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ra - tiz ̣ d ̣ arm a - bdda - ttnawalm afulki , tg ̇ usm zg ̇ - kullu ma - igan lɛib ula kullu ma - iššh ̣ ššamn mddn ar ass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk lmasih ̣ .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: rad - awn - tigat s ̣ s ̣ abt n - ufulki lli - gigun - iskar yasuɛ lmasih ̣ , iban gigun lmjd n - rbbi , alg ̇ n - t mddn f - ssibt - nnun .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: way - aytma , rig ̇ a - tissanm g ̇ ayad - iyi - ijran izuyd g ̇ - twassna l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin ,

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: ayllig ̇ ssnn kullu imh ̬ zniyn l - lqs ̣ r d - wiyyad ̣ ggutnin izd f - ssibt l - lmasih ̣ a - f - tyamaz ̣ g ̇ .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: ula aytmatnng ̇ , iggut gisn ma - iwrrin idus g ̇ - siditnng ̇ f - ssibt n - iskraf - inu . zɛmn bahra ar - tbrrah ̣ n s - uggʷar s - wawal n - rbbi , ur - a - tiksad ̣ n yat .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: ssng ̇ kra gisn ar - ttirin ad - zzwurn ssimg ̇ urn ih ̬ f - nsn , g ̇ ayan ka - f - a - tbrrah ̣ n f - lmasih ̣ . walaynni illa sul mad - dar - tlla nniyt is ̣ fan ,

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: ar - tbrrah ̣ n f - ssibt l - lh ̣ nant lli - gisn - illan , ašku ssnn is - iyi - d - yiwi rbbi s - g ̇ id baš ad - th ̣ amag ̇ f - lh ̬ bar ifulkin .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: imma wiyyad ̣ yad ̣ ni urd s - uwl is ̣ fan a - s - a - tbrrah ̣ n f - lmasih ̣ , ašku ran ad - amz ̣ n g ̇ ir kra i - ih ̬ f - nsn , irin ad - iyi - ssigatn tanukmut g ̇ - lh ̣ bs .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: imma nkki , ma - rad - inig ̇ ? abla - ad - frh ̣ g ̇ ig ̇ - a - sflidn mddn i - tbrrah ̣ t f - lmasih ̣ , ig - iyt f - imi n - ayt - sin - uwdmawn ng ̇ d wid dar ul is ̣ fan . hati rad - sul - frh ̣ g ̇ ,

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: ašku mayd - iyi - ijran , ssng ̇ is - ra - zgis - njmg ̇ tigira f - ssibt n - ma - flla - ttd ̣ alabm rbbi ar - iyi - itɛawan rruh ̣ n - yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: iggut gigi rrja , irig ̇ bahra ad - skarg ̇ kullu ma - yyi - d - iqqann s - zzɛamt iggutn , baš a - gigi - tban - tmug ̇ ra l - lmasih ̣ g ̇ ilad zund kraygatt luqt , ig ̇ - sulg ̇ ula ig ̇ - mmutg ̇ .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: ašku dari nkki : ig ̇ - ddrg ̇ , lmasih ̣ a - igan tudrt - inu . ig ̇ - mmutg ̇ , rad - iyi - yili ma - yufn tudrt - ad .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: ur - ssing ̇ manwa ra - gisn - irig ̇ , ašku ig ̇ - sulg ̇ g ̇ - ddat rad - iz ̣ d ̣ arg ̇ ad - zaydg ̇ g ̇ - twuri - ad ifulkin .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: rig ̇ mayad ula mayan s - sin . rig ̇ bahra ad - ffug ̇ g ̇ ddunit - ad ilig ̇ d - lmasih ̣ , ašku ifulki mayan s - uggʷar .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: walaynni f - ssibt - nnun ra - yaf ad - qamag ̇ g ̇ - ddat .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: ssng ̇ bahra is - yuf g ̇ mkad . rad - sulg ̇ qamag ̇ didun kullukn baš a - ttzayadm ar - ttfrah ̣ m g ̇ - ug ̇ aras n - siditnng ̇ .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - rad - bahra - ttfrah ̣ m s - lmasih ̣ yasuɛ f - ssibt - inu g ̇ akud llig ̇ ra - n - dag ̇ - darun - aškg ̇ .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: walaynni illa fllawn a - tskarm s - ma - d - imšaškan d - lh ̬ bar ifulkin l - lmasih ̣ . ašku rig ̇ a - bdda - fllawn - sflidg ̇ is - kullu - tzgam g ̇ - yan - ug ̇ aras , ig ̇ - d - fllawn - aggugg ̇ ng ̇ d ig ̇ - n - darun - uškig ̇ , ar - kullu - tth ̬ damm s - yat - tnbat ̣ t ̣ baš a - tsslmadm lh ̣ qq l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin g ̇ mklli iga

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: bla - da - ttiksad ̣ m zg ̇ - willi - kʷn - ssrfufunnin . g ̇ mkad a - s - rad - z ̣ rn is - llan ntni g ̇ - ug ̇ aras l - lhalak tilim kunni g ̇ - ug ̇ aras n - ujnjm , ašku rbbi a - ra - kʷn - ijjnjm .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: ašku llig ̇ - awn - ifka a - tamnm s - lmasih ̣ , ifka - yawn ula tarfufnt f - ssibt - ns .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: tkšmm ula kunni s - imig ̇ lli - tz ̣ ram mmag ̇ g ̇ srs nkki , tsfldm ula g ̇ ilad is - a - sul - srs - tmmag ̇ g ̇ .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: is - ur - tdusm tzɛmm f - ssibt n - ma - tgam win lmasih ̣ ? is - ur - a - kʷn - tssfjjij tayri - ns ? is - ur - a - tssh ̣ ssam s - tamunt n - rruh ̣ - ns ? is - ur - darun lh ̣ nant ula lmh ̣ bbt iggutn n - ingratun ?

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: llig ̇ darun illa kullu mayan , ra - kʷn - d ̣ albg ̇ ad - iyi - tkmmlm lfrh ̣ - inu , tgm kullu yan g ̇ - iswingimn - nnun ula tayri - nnun , tmunm g ̇ - yan - ug ̇ aras , tmšaškam - d g ̇ - yat - tnbat ̣ t ̣ .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: a - ur - tskarm kra f - a - tzzwurm ih ̬ f - nnun ula - da - ttirim a - tmlm is - tgam kra , walaynni z ̣ z ̣ imz ̣ ayat ih ̬ f - nnun ar - bdda - ttggam wiyyad ̣ d - ma - kʷn - yufn .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: illa f - kud yan gigun a - ur - iswingim g ̇ ir g ̇ - ma - ira i - ih ̬ f - ns , walaynni a - iswingim ula g ̇ - ma - rad - irin wiyyad ̣ .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: illa fllawn a - tswingimm g ̇ mklli iswingim lmasih ̣ yasuɛ .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: iga ntta g ̇ mklli iga rbbi , walaynni ur - ig ̇ wi g ̇ - mayan a - n - sul - iqama g ̇ mklli iga rbbi .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: hati ifl - n kullu mad - dars - illan , iwrri ig zund ismg , ilul g ̇ - s ̣ s ̣ urt n - bnadm .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: llig ̇ iga s - ssift n - bnadm , yadr - d i - ih ̬ f - ns , iskr kullu ma - gis - ira rbbi ayllig ̇ immut s - lmut išqan f - uggjdi .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: f - mayan a - f - t - yull rbbi s - tattuyt n - ignna , ifk - as ism lli - yugʷrn kraygatt ism ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: baš a - d - iknu kraygatt afud s - ism n - yasuɛ , g ̇ - ignna ula g ̇ - wakal ula g ̇ - ddu - wakal ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: yini kraygatt ils : « yasuɛ lmasih ̣ a - igan sidis n - kullu ma - illan . » g ̇ mkad a - s - rad - kullu - uqqrn lmjd n - rbbi babatnng ̇ .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: f - mayan a - f - ra - kʷn - us ̣ s ̣ ag ̇ ay - aytma ɛzzanin , ašku ssng ̇ is - tram a - tskarm ma - fllawn - illan , g ̇ ilad g ̇ - d - fllawn - aggugg ̇ g ̇ mklli - ti - tskarm g ̇ akud llig ̇ - n - didun - llig ̇ . f - mayan a - f - rad - awn - inig ̇ : skarat kullu baš a - tssafum ajnjm lli - s - tnjmm , ar - bahra - ttuqqarm rbbi ar - bdda - stti - ttawim g ̇ - ma - ira ntta .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: ašku rbbi a - bdda - gigun - ih ̣ kamn baš a - ttirim ma - t - ird ̣ an ar - srs - tskarm .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: zaydat g ̇ - kullu mayad bla - da - ttngmugm ula - da - ttz ̣ im ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: baš a - tg ̇ usm bla gigun illa kra l - lɛib , tgm tarwa šwanin n - rbbi g ̇ - wammas n - tasut - ad yʷh ̬ šnn ijlan . ha - kunni zund itran g ̇ - ignwan a - s - a - tfawm g ̇ - wammas - nsn ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: ar - asn - tmalam awal n - tudrt . mayan a - s - rad - srun - frh ̣ g ̇ bahra g ̇ - wass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk lmasih ̣ , z ̣ rg ̇ is - urd bla lfaytt a - s - a - tazzalg ̇ ar - tnhatafg ̇ g ̇ - darun .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: wah ̬ h ̬ a ig ̇ - rad - ffin idammn - inu f - iggi n - twafka l - liman - nnun zund aman n - wad ̣ il lli - tffin mddn f - twafkiw - nsn g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi , ha - yyi rd ̣ ig ̇ s - mayan , frh ̣ g ̇ srun kullukn .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: ula kunni illa fllawn a - srs - trd ̣ um , tfrh ̣ m didi .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: ar - trjug ̇ g ̇ - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ ad - awn - in - azng ̇ timutaws g ̇ - mayd - d - yakmurn baš a - yyi - d - issfrh ̣ ula nkki s - kra l - lh ̬ bar zg ̇ - darun .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: ur - dari yan iswingimn zund nttan , ar - tt - itawi bahra g ̇ - mamnk a - tgam .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: ašku kud yan ar - iswingim g ̇ - ma - igan wins , urd ma - igan win yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: imma kunni tssnm f - timutaws is - ifulki bahra , tissanm mamnk a - didi - ith ̬ dam zund arraw d - babas g ̇ - twuri l - lh ̬ bar ifulkin .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: ar - trjug ̇ a - t - in - azng ̇ g ̇ ilad , walaynni ar - tqlg ̇ ard z ̣ rg ̇ ma - s - rad - iyi - tggʷru g ̇ id .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: ha - yyi tiqqng ̇ g ̇ - siditnng ̇ ra - n - aškg ̇ ula nkki s - darun g ̇ - mayd - d - yakmurn .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: iriyat a - bdda - t ̣ t ̣ rrh ̣ m ar - ttlhum s - twuri n - ih ̬ f - nnun ar - tth ̬ damm s - ifassn - nnun , g ̇ mklli - awn - nenna g ̇ ayd izrin .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - f - ra - kʷn - tuqqarn mddn lli - ur - ginin win lmasih ̣ , ur - ra - th ̣ tajjam yan .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: way - aytmatnng ̇ , nra a - tissanm ma - ra - ijru i - willi mmutnin , baš a - kʷn - ur - tag ̇ - tgud ̣ i zund mddn yad ̣ ni lli - ur - dar rrja .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: maylli - s - ag ̇ - imla siditnng ̇ a - rad - awn - nini : nkkʷni lli - ra - iqama nsul ar ass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk siditnng ̇ , ur - ra - nzwur g ̇ willi mmutnin .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: way - aytmatnng ̇ , ur - ag ̇ - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a ad - awn - in - nara kra f - uwssan ula izmaz lli - g ̇ - rad - jrunt - tg ̇ awsiwin - ad ,

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: ašku kunni kullukn tgam ayt - tifawt , tgm ayt - uzal . hati urd win - iyd ̣ a - nga ng ̇ d win tillas .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .

text2: hati g ̇ - iyd ̣ a - g ̇ - a - t ̣ t ̣ asn mddn ar - ssnufuln ih ̬ f - nsn s - tissi .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: ašku ur - iqs ̣ ad rbbi a - fllanng ̇ - yut lɛqubit , walaynni iqs ̣ ad ad - ag ̇ - ijjnjm f - uwdm n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: immut nttan f - ssibt - nng ̇ baš a - dids - nddr , ig ̇ - nmmut ng ̇ d ig ̇ - nnit - nsul ard - d - yašk .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: mlat - asn mnšk a - s - darun - ɛzzan f - ssibt n - twuri - nsn . gat s - sslamt i - ngratun .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: ra - kʷn - nd ̣ alb ay - aytmatnng ̇ , a - ttns ̣ ah ̣ m wanna ur - ittirin a - ih ̬ dm , ar - tzzɛamm wanna itiksad ̣ n , ar - ttɛawanm wanna id ̣ ɛfn , ar - tts ̣ barm d - kraygatt yan .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: rarat lɛaql ig ̇ - illa mad - awn - iskrn kra yʷh ̬ šnn , ad - as - t - ur - trarm s - lh ̬ ʷšant . gat - n tiqqi - nnun a - bdda - ttirim a - tskarm afulki g ̇ - gratun ula d - kullu mddn .

text: Rejoice evermore .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .

text2: tanfm i - kullu ma - yʷh ̬ šnn .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .

text: Brethren , pray for us .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: ad - awn - tili lbaraka n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: zg ̇ - bulus d - sila d - timutaws , i - umnaggar n - willi ganin win rbbi babatnng ̇ d - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ g ̇ - tmdint n - tasaluniki .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ad - awn - tili lbaraka d - sslamt zg ̇ - rbbi babatnng ̇ d - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: way - aytmatnng ̇ , iqqan - ag ̇ - d a - bdda - ntškar rbbi fllawn , ig lh ̣ qq ginng ̇ a - t - ntškar , ašku ar - ttzayadm ar - ttimg ̇ urm bahra g ̇ - liman - nnun , iwrri kud yan gigun ar - bahra - ith ̣ nnu g ̇ - wiyyad ̣ .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: hati ar - kʷn - ntalg ̇ g ̇ - dar imnaggarn n - rbbi , ašku tumz ̣ m g ̇ - rbbi sul tzgam , wah ̬ h ̬ a da - tzraym g ̇ - trfufnt d - tnukmut iggutn .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: g ̇ akudan a - ra - yut rbbi lɛqubit f - willi srs rurnin tig ̇ urdin - nsn , agʷin ad - sflidn s - lh ̬ bar ifulkin n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: g ̇ - wass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk siditnng ̇ a - t - alg ̇ n imz ̣ layn - ns , tɛjjbn gis kullu g ̇ willi srs umnnin . ula kunni ra - zgisn - tgm , ašku tumnm tugga lli - awn - in - niwi .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ra - gigun - iban lmjd n - ism n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ , yili - awn lmjd ula kunni dids s - lbaraka n - rbbi - nng ̇ d - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: way - aytmatnng ̇ , nra g ̇ ilad ad - awn - nini f - mamnk a - ra - d - yašk siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ , nmun kullwag ̇ baš a - dids - nmnaggar .

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: walaynni ad - ur - tasim tag ̇ uft ula tg ̇ uwd ̣ m ig ̇ - tsfldm i - kra n - yan ar - ittini « izri - wass lli - g ̇ - d - yuška siditnng ̇ . » a - ur - ti - tamnm wah ̬ h ̬ a ig ̇ - awn - inna imla - yas - t rruh ̣ lqudus ng ̇ d isfld i - lh ̬ bar - ns ng ̇ d ig ̇ ra - t g ̇ - kra n - tbrat zg ̇ - darnng ̇ .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: ra - issimg ̇ ur ih ̬ f - ns ar - itz ̣ i f - kullu mad - tɛbadn mddn ula kullu ma - mi - tz ̣ allan . ra - ikšm ula s - tgmmi n - rbbi igawr gis yini izd nttan a - igan rbbi .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: tissanm ma - t - ih ̣ s ̣ arn g ̇ ilad baš a - ur - d - iban ard - d - ilkm - uzmz - ns .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: imma anuwwaš - an , ra - dars - tigat - th ̣ kimt n - šit ̣ an , ra - izzga tikrkas - ns s - lmɛjizat d - lquwwat d - tmitar tjhhdnin .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: walaynni iqqan - ag ̇ - d a - bdda - ntškar rbbi fllawn ay - aytmatnng ̇ lli - f - ih ̣ nna siditnng ̇ , ašku iz ̣ li - kʷn zg ̇ - isizwar a - tnjmm , issg ̇ us - kʷn s - rruh ̣ lqudus baš a - tgm wins f - ssibt n - ma - tumnm lh ̣ qq .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: kullu mayad , ig ̇ ra - yawn - d srs rbbi s - lh ̬ bar ifulkin lli - awn - in - niwi , baš ad - awn - tili tag ̇ amt g ̇ - lmjd n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: d ̣ albat - t ad - ag ̇ - issanf i - mddn šqanin ʷh ̬ šnnin , ašku ur - a - kullu - ttirin ad - amnn .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: imma siditnng ̇ iqama - bdda g ̇ - wawal - ns , ra - kʷn - issdus issntal - kʷn zg ̇ - walli yʷh ̬ šnn .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: hati isshnna - yag ̇ siditnng ̇ f - ssibt - nnun , nissan is - a - tskarm kullu mad - awn - nenna rad - bdda - ti - tskarm .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: imma g ̇ ilad , nd ̣ alb siditnng ̇ a - kʷn - ihdu baš a - tth ̣ nnum g ̇ mklli ith ̣ nnu rbbi , ar - tts ̣ barm g ̇ mklli its ̣ bar lmasih ̣ .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: way - aytmatnng ̇ , s - ism n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ lmasih ̣ a - s - ra - kʷn - nus ̣ s ̣ a g ̇ ilad , nini - awn a - ttanfm i - aytmatn nna - yagʷin ad - th ̬ damn ula - da - skarn s - ulmmud lli - awn - nsslmd .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: ašku tssnm is - kʷn - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a a - tskarm g ̇ mklli nskar nkkʷni , ur - ngawr g ̇ - darun bla - da - nth ̬ dam .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: ur - jju - nšši ag ̇ rum n - yan bla - yas - nfka atig - ns . nkka - ttin ar - nth ̬ dam g ̇ - iyd ̣ ula azal , ar - nkkat takrrayt baš a - ur - nz ̣ z ̣ ay f - yan gigun .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: illa yan gu - krit lli - mi - ttinin ‹ nnabi › , ula ntta isawl fllasn inna : « ayt - krit ar - bdda - sskirkisn . zund luh ̣ uš ʷh ̬ šnnin ad - gan . g ̇ ir it ̣ s d - umššu a - f - a - skarn . »

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
