text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: walaynni llig ̇ ikmml kullu ma - fllas - illan , ijjnjm g ̇ willi skarnin s - wawal - ns s - ujnjm idumn ,

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: ig - t rbbi d - unmg ̇ ur ihiyyan zund malkis ̣ adq .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: iggut dari mad - awn - ttinig ̇ f - mayad , walaynni ra - išqu a - ti - tfhmm , ašku wrrin z ̣ z ̣ ayn imzgan - nnun .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: han illa f - kullu winna zzrinin unšk - ad l - luqt lli - tzzrim kunni , ad - iz ̣ d ̣ arn ad - sslmadn wiyyad ̣ . imma kunni , hati sul th ̣ tajjam mad - awn - isslmadn tinbad ̣ in timzwura n - ug ̇ aras n - rbbi . ha - kunni sul - kʷn - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a - ukkʷfay , ur - ta - tz ̣ d ̣ arm i - umššu .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: ašku wanna ur - issan g ̇ ir akkʷfay ur - ta - issin mamnk a - s - ra - ird ̣ u rbbi , ašku sul imz ̣ z ̣ i .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: imma amššu iga win imqqurn lli - myarnin ad - swingimn ar - at ̣ t ̣ un ma - išwan zg ̇ - ma - yʷh ̬ šnn .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: imma g ̇ ilad , a - nzri zg ̇ - tg ̇ awsiwin - an timzwura n - ulmmud f - lmasih ̣ , nzayd s - ma - igan win imqqurn . a - ur - dag ̇ - nttiri a - nzzugz llsas lli - yad - nzzugz g ̇ ayd izrin f - mamnk a - s - ra - d - nwrri zg ̇ - iskkirn h ̬ wanin n - bnadm namn s - ma - iskr rbbi .

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: a - ur - dag ̇ - nsawal g ̇ ir f - isiridn ng ̇ d asrus n - ifassn ng ̇ d tankra n - willi mmutnin ng ̇ d lh ̣ ukm l - lih ̬ rt .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: ra - nzri zg ̇ - tg ̇ awsiwin - an , nzayd s - kra yad ̣ ni ig ̇ - ira rbbi .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: imma g ̇ willi z ̣ ranin tifawt , md ̣ in lbaraka n - ignna , kšmn s - tamunt n - rruh ̣ lqudus ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: frh ̣ n s - wawal n - rbbi ula lquwwat n - uzmz lli - ra - d - yašk ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: ig ̇ - rurn ntni tig ̇ urdin - nsn s - rbbi tigira n - kullu mayan , ur - sar - rad - iz ̣ d ̣ arn a - d - dag ̇ - wrrin s - ug ̇ aras . ašku mlan i - kullu mddn is - h ̣ grn yus n - rbbi , agʷln - t f - uggjdi tis snat - twal .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: ašku akal nna - issan anz ̣ ar lli - d - fllas - it ̣ t ̣ arn , ar - yakka s ̣ s ̣ abt išwan i - willi - t - krznin , ra - gis - tili lbaraka n - rbbi .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: imma akal nna - ur - issmg ̇ ayn abla azggʷar d - tskra , ur - infɛa s - yat . takmur - d srs nnɛlt , d - ujddar a - s - rad - as - tggʷru .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , wah ̬ h ̬ a srun nsawl g ̇ mkad , nssn is - gigun - illa ma - yufn g ̇ ayan , ašku tgam wid ijjnjm rbbi .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: nttan , s - lh ̣ qq a - s - a - ith ̣ kam . ur - ra - ittu tawuri lli - tskrm ula ittu mamnk a - tusim ism - ns s - lfrh ̣ tɛawanm imz ̣ layn - ns , ar - tn - sul - ttɛawanm .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad nra kud yan gigun a - itzayad g ̇ mkan s - zzɛamt ar isiggʷra , baš a - tkšmm kullukn s - lbaraka lli - n - ntrju .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: a - ur - ttrmaym tflm ma - kʷn - d - iqqann , walaynni skarat zund kullu willi umnnin s ̣ brn ayllig ̇ kšmn s - tmih ̬ ar lli - f - asn - inna rbbi .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: llig ̇ isawl rbbi s - ibrahim f - ma - rad - as - ifk , yini - as - t s - ism - ns , ašku ur - illi kra n - ism yugʷrn ism n - rbbi .

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: yini - as : « ra - k - barkg ̇ fkg ̇ - ak tarwa ggutnin . »

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: iql ibrahim is ̣ br ayllig ̇ - as - ityawfka maylli - s - as - inna rbbi .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: hati s - ism n - ma - tn - yugʷrn a - s - aqran mddn , baš ad - zzgan iwaliwn - nsn , a - ur - sul - gisn - tškkun wiyyad ̣ .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: g ̇ mkan a - iskr rbbi , yiri a - issml i - willi ra - iwrt timih ̬ ar - ns is - ur - ra - iwrri g ̇ - wawal lli - s - asn - inna . mayan a - f - izuyd ism - ns i - wawal - ns .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: ašku sin - ad , ur - illi ma - iz ̣ d ̣ arn a - tn - igllb ula iz ̣ d ̣ ar rbbi a - fllasn - isskarks . g ̇ mkan a - iskr f - ssibt - nng ̇ nkkʷni lli - gis - izawgn , baš a - bahra - nzɛm namz ̣ s - uggʷar g ̇ - rrja lli - ag ̇ - ifka .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: rrja is ̣ h ̣ an izgan ayad , ssrs ̣ an gis - uwlawn - nng ̇ ard - ag ̇ - išškšm zg ̇ - lh ̬ amiya s - th ̣ anut ityawqdasn ,

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: s - illis ikšm yasuɛ lli - ag ̇ - izwarn a - bdda - ig anmg ̇ ur ihiyyan f - ssibt - nng ̇ g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi g ̇ mklli iga malkis ̣ adq .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: malkis ̣ adq ikka - ttin iga agllid n - tmdint n - salim , ig anmg ̇ ur ibiddn g ̇ - gr mddn d - rbbi amattuy . nttan a - n - imnaggarn ibrahim ibark - t llig ̇ - d - iwrri ibrahim zg ̇ - imig ̇ lli - g ̇ - inra igldan yad ̣ ni .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: ifk - as ibrahim tis mrawt zg ̇ - kullu ma - d - ikkis i - igldan - lli . malkis ̣ adq , tga lmɛna n - ism - ns ‹ agllid lli - ird ̣ an rbbi › . ig ntta agllid n - salim , tga lmɛna - ns ‹ agllid n - sslamt › .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: ur - ityara yat f - babas ng ̇ d innas ng ̇ d imzwura - ns , ula ityara yat f - tlalit - ns ng ̇ d lmut - ns , walaynni irwas i - yus n - rbbi ašku iga - bdda anmg ̇ ur ibiddn g ̇ - gr mddn d - rbbi .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: z ̣ rat mnšk a - s - imqqur malkis ̣ adq , ašku nttan a - mi - ifka babatnng ̇ ibrahim tis mrawt zg ̇ - kullu ma - d - ikkis i - igldan .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: nssn izd ayt - lawi a - ityawz ̣ layn g ̇ - ššrɛ n - musa f - ad - skarn tawuri n - tgmmi n - rbbi , ar - asn - akkan mddn tis mrawt zg ̇ - kullu ma - darsn - illan , wah ̬ h ̬ a gan ntni aytmatsn zg ̇ - tasut n - ibrahim .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: imma malkis ̣ adq , wah ̬ h ̬ a ur - igi zg ̇ - ayt - lawi , yumz ̣ zg ̇ - ibrahim tis mrawt , ifk ilmma lbaraka - ns i - ibrahim lli - isti rbbi a - iwrt kullu ma - f - as - inna .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: iban is - yugʷr malkis ̣ adq ibrahim , ašku g ̇ walli imqqurn a - yakkan lbaraka i - walli ikkan ddawas .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: imma ayt - lawi lli - tamz ̣ nin tis mrawt g ̇ ilad , ntni bnadm kad - gan ar - tmtatn . walaynni g ̇ walli mi ifka ibrahim tis mrawt , ityara fllas is - iddr .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: ayt - lawi lli - tamz ̣ nin tis mrawt , nz ̣ d ̣ ar a - fllasn - nini izd ntni a - ifkan tis mrawt i - malkis ̣ adq f - ufus n - babatsn ibrahim .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: ašku sul - n - illa lawi g ̇ - ugʷns n - ddat n - ibrahim , ur - ta - jju - d - ilul , a - imnaggar d - malkis ̣ adq .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: rbbi iskr inmg ̇ urn zg ̇ - ayt - lawi baš ad - zzgan ššrɛ . gan ntni zg ̇ - tasut n - unmg ̇ ur harun . walaynni mrad is - z ̣ d ̣ arn ad - šškšmn mddn s - kullu - ma - iqs ̣ ad rbbi , ur - rad - h ̣ tajjan mddn ad - asn - d - yašk yan - unmg ̇ ur yad ̣ ni igan zund malkis ̣ adq .

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: walaynni llig ̇ ibddl rbbi inmg ̇ urn - an s - unmg ̇ ur - ad yad ̣ ni , iqqan - d a - ityawbddal ššrɛ ula ntta .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: ur - igi - unmg ̇ ur - ad zg ̇ - tqbilt n - lawi , walaynni iga zg ̇ - yat - tqbilt yad ̣ ni lli - zg ̇ - ur - jju - ih ̬ dim kra n - yan g ̇ - twuri n - uz ̣ ru n - tg ̇ rsi .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: imma siditnng ̇ , nssn is - iga zg ̇ - tqbilt n - yahuda . ur - jju - iskir musa kra n - inmg ̇ urn zg ̇ - tqbilt - an .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: imla - yag ̇ mayan is - iga siditnng ̇ yan - unmg ̇ ur zund malkis ̣ adq , urd zund ayt - lawi .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: iwrri iga anmg ̇ ur s - th ̣ kimt n - tudrt idumn , urd s - lwrt n - tasutin n - bnadm .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: g ̇ mklli ityaran : « ra - tgt anmg ̇ ur idumn zund malkis ̣ adq . »

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: ur - sul - a - itgga rbbi ayt - lawi d - inmg ̇ urn - ns , ašku ur - z ̣ d ̣ arn ad - biddn g ̇ - gras d - mddn g ̇ mklli ira .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: han ššrɛ n - musa ur - ikmmil yat , walaynni rbbi ifka - yag ̇ g ̇ ilad yan - rrja is ̣ h ̣ an lli - yufn mayan , ar - n - srs - ntakmur i - rbbi .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: llig ̇ isawl rbbi f - rrja - yad , izzga awal - ns s - ism - ns . inmg ̇ urn yad ̣ ni , ur - izzga rbbi az ̣ lay - nsn s - ism - ns ,

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: walaynni s - ism - ns a - s - izzga az ̣ lay n - yasuɛ . g ̇ mklli ityaran : « s - ism - ns a - s - d - isawl sidi rbbi , ur - ra - iwrri g ̇ - wawal - ns , yini - as ‹ ra - tgt anmg ̇ ur idumn . › »

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - s - iwrri yasuɛ iga d ̣ d ̣ amn n - yal - lɛhd lli - bahra - yufn lɛhd - an yad ̣ ni .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: wrrin ggutn inmg ̇ urn n - ššrɛ bahra , ašku ar - tmtatn ar - d - faln tawuri - nsn i - mad - asn - iggʷran .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: imma yasuɛ iga wad ur - sar - itmmin , ig anmg ̇ ur idumn .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: mayad a - f - iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - ijjnjm kullu winna - n - issruh ̣ i - rbbi g ̇ ilad ula kullu mayd - d - iftan , ašku iddr - bdda a - itd ̣ alab rbbi fllasn .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: wan anmg ̇ ur - ad a - nh ̣ tajja , iɛmmr s - ufulki n - rbbi , ig ̇ us - uwl - ns , ur - gis - illi kra l - lɛib , ityawz ̣ lay zg ̇ - kullu ma - iskarn ddnub , ityalal s - iggi n - ignwan .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: ur - igi zund inmg ̇ urn n - ššrɛ , ašku ur - t - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a a - n - issakmur tig ̇ rsiw i - rbbi ass f - wass f - ddnub - ns ntta ula f - ddnub n - mddn yad ̣ ni . ašku yasuɛ , yat - tg ̇ rsi a - n - issakmur yat - twal f - ddnub - nng ̇ kullwag ̇ llig ̇ ifka ih ̬ f - ns immt .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: d ̣ ɛfn inmg ̇ urn n - ššrɛ ašku bnadm kad - gan . imma yus n - rbbi , ityawz ̣ lay s - ism - ns tigira n - ššrɛ , ikmml srs rbbi kullu ma - srs - iqs ̣ ad .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: kullu mayad imla - yag ̇ is - darnng ̇ anmg ̇ ur ihiyyan lli - nh ̣ tajja , iskiws f - ufasi l - lɛrš n - rbbi l - lmjd g ̇ - ignna .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: ar - iskar tawuri n - th ̣ anut tamz ̣ layt g ̇ - uh ̬ iyyam is ̣ h ̣ an lli - ibna sidi rbbi , urd g ̇ - g ̇ walli ittbnan s - ifassn n - bnadm .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: anmg ̇ ur nna - illan , hati ityawz ̣ lay f - a - n - issakmur tiwafkiw d - tg ̇ rsiw i - rbbi . mayan a - f - d - iqqan yasuɛ ula ntta a - n - issakmur kra .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: mrad is - ra - iqama yasuɛ g ̇ - ddunit - ad ur - ra - iskar tawuri n - tgmmi n - rbbi g ̇ - ddunit - ad , ašku llan gis g ̇ willi - n - ssakmurnin tiwafkiw s - mklli - f - yus ̣ s ̣ a ššrɛ .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: tah ̣ anut tamz ̣ layt lli - g ̇ - a - skarn tawuri - nsn ur - tgi abla zund yat - tmatart ula yan - umalu n - ma - illan g ̇ - ignna . mayan a - f - yus ̣ s ̣ a rbbi musa llig ̇ iskr f - a - ibnu ah ̬ iyyam , yini - as : « rar lɛaql a - tskrt kullu zund maylli - ak - mlig ̇ f - iggi n - udrar . »

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: imma tawuri n - yasuɛ tugʷr tin inmg ̇ urn - an yad ̣ ni , g ̇ mklli yugʷr lɛhd lli - d - yiwi yasuɛ lɛhd - nsn , ašku lbarakat lli - d - srs - ifka rbbi ugʷrnt tin lɛhd - an aqdim .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: lɛhd aqdim , mrad is - ikmml kullu ma - iqs ̣ ad rbbi , ikun ur - ra - iskr yal - lɛhd l - ljdid .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: walaynni sidi rbbi iz ̣ ra mddn - ns ur - ssuwfin kullu ma - gisn - ira . yini ilmma : « rad - d - aškin - uwssan lli - g ̇ - rad - skrg ̇ yal - lɛhd l - ljdid d - mddn - inu n - ayt - yaɛqub d - ayt - yudaya .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: ur - ra - ig zund lɛhd lli - skrg ̇ d - imzwura - nsn llig ̇ - asn - umz ̣ g ̇ afus ssufg ̇ g ̇ - tn - d zg ̇ - mis ̣ r . ašku ntni ur - sul - qaman f - lɛhd - an . f - mayan a - f - wrrig ̇ flg ̇ - tn .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: walaynni g ̇ mkad a - ra - ig lɛhd lli - rad - skrg ̇ d - mddn - inu g ̇ - uwssan - an . ra - n - gg ̇ tinbad ̣ in - inu g ̇ - ih ̬ fawn - nsn , arag ̇ - tnt f - uwlawn - nsn . rad - gg ̇ rbbi - nsn , gn ntni mddn - inu .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: ur - ra - yini yan i - gu - tmazirt - ns ula i - gu - tgmmi - ns ‹ ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a - k a - tissant sidi rbbi , › ašku ra - yyi - issann kullutn , zg ̇ - imz ̣ z ̣ iyn ar imqqurn .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: ra - fllasn - ssittig ̇ ddnub - nsn , ur - sar - rad - d - swangmg ̇ lh ̬ ʷšanat lli - skrn . »

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: imma lɛhd - ad , llig ̇ - t - iga rbbi d - ljdid , iban - umzwaru is - iga aqdim . aynna igan aqdim , hati imda . g ̇ ir imikk ra - t - lah ̣ .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: lɛhd amzwaru , llant gis lus ̣ iyat f - mamnk a - s - ra - tɛbadn mddn , ula mamnk a - s - rad - skrn yan - udg ̇ ar ityawz ̣ layn i - rbbi g ̇ - ddunit - ad .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: ssg ̇ lin g ̇ mkan yan - uh ̬ iyyam , tili gis yat - th ̣ anut , ar - as - ttinin ‹ tah ̣ anut tamz ̣ layt › , lli - g ̇ - tlla lh ̣ ska ula t ̣ t ̣ bla lli - f - a - srasn ag ̇ rum g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: g ̇ - ugʷns n - th ̣ anut - an , g ̇ - tg ̇ urdin n - tis snat lh ̬ wami , ag ̇ - n - tlla yat - th ̣ anut yad ̣ ni , ar - as - ttinin ‹ tah ̣ anut ityawqdasn › .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: tlla gis t ̣ t ̣ bla n - uwrg ̇ lli - f - a - tbh ̬ h ̬ arn , ula s ̣ s ̣ nduq l - lɛhd lli - idln s - uwrg ̇ zg ̇ - kraygatt tasga . g ̇ - s ̣ s ̣ nduq - an a - g ̇ - tlla yat tat ̣ t ̣ ast n - uwrg ̇ tusi ag ̇ rum n - ‹ manna › , ula aɛmud n - harun lli - img ̇ in , ula tilwah ̣ n - uz ̣ ru lli - f - tyarant lus ̣ iyat l - lɛhd .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: llan sin ‹ karubim › f - uflla n - s ̣ s ̣ nduq , ar - ssbayyann lmjd n - rbbi . dln ntni s - ifrawn - nsn illi - zg ̇ - a - tittin ddnub n - mddn . imma tig ̇ awsiwin - an , ur - rad - bahra - nsawl g ̇ ilad f - mamnk ad - gant .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: walaynni llig ̇ kullu ngaddant - tg ̇ awsiwin - an , ar - kššmn inmg ̇ urn s - th ̣ anut tamzwarut ad - skarn tawuri - nsn .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: imma tah ̣ anut tis snat , ur - a - srs - ikššm yan . g ̇ ir anmg ̇ ur ihiyyan a - srs - ikššmn yat - twal g ̇ - kraygatt asggʷas , ar - dids - itawi idammn , ar - tn - in - issakmur i - rbbi f - ssibt n - ddnub - ns ula ddnub lli - skrn mddn - ns bla ssnn is - tn - skrn .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ag ̇ - imla rruh ̣ lqudus is - ur - ta - yujad - ug ̇ aras lli - itawin s - th ̣ anut ityawqdasn , mah ̣ dd sul tqama - th ̣ anut tamzwarut n - uh ̬ iyyam .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: lmɛna - yad tmla - yag ̇ mamnk ad - gan ayt - yudaya sul s - g ̇ assad . ar - n - ssakmurn tiwafkiw d - tg ̇ rsiw lli - ur - z ̣ d ̣ arnin ad - ssg ̇ usnt ulawn n - willi - srsnti - tɛbadnin .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: ašku ur - gint g ̇ ir tin - umššu d - tissi d - isiridn . tig ̇ awsiwin - an , g ̇ ir tin ddat ad - gant . ur - rad - qamant g ̇ ir ar akud nna - ibddl rbbi kullu mayan s - kra igan ljdid .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: imma lmasih ̣ yuška - d a - ig anmg ̇ ur ihiyyan l - lbarakat lli - ag ̇ - illan g ̇ ilad . ah ̬ iyyam lli - g ̇ - iskr tawuri - ns yuf g ̇ walli - sttin - ikkan , yagʷr - t bahra . urd g ̇ - ddunit - ad a - g ̇ - illa , ula ityawskar s - ifassn n - bnadm .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: g ̇ ir yat - twal a - srs - ikšm ntta , urd s - idammn n - wag ̇ ad ̣ n ula win imugayn walaynni s - idammn n - ddat - ns . g ̇ mkad a - s - ag ̇ - ifra zg ̇ - ddnub - nng ̇ s - ujnjm idumn .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: nssn wanna iskrn kra ih ̣ rmn , ar - ti - truššn inmg ̇ urn n - ayt - yudaya s - idammn n - wag ̇ ad ̣ n ng ̇ d win imugayn ng ̇ d s - ig ̇ d n - tgizt ityawjdarn , baš a - tg ̇ us ddat - nsn zg ̇ - lh ̣ ram .

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: walaynni uggʷar n - g ̇ mkan a - rad - ag ̇ - issg ̇ us lmasih ̣ s - idammn - ns . ašku isrs - n ih ̬ f - ns lli - kullu - is ̣ fan g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi s - th ̣ kimt n - rruh ̣ lli - idumn . issg ̇ us ulawn - nng ̇ zg ̇ - iskkirn mmutnin baš a - nwrri ng ih ̬ ddamn n - rbbi lli - iddrn .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - iskr lmasih ̣ yal - lɛhd l - ljdid g ̇ - gr rbbi d - bnadm , išškšm srs g ̇ willi mi - d - ig ̇ ra rbbi s - lwrt idumn lli - f - asn - inna rad - asn - yili . immut lmasih ̣ baš a - ifru mddn zg ̇ - ddnub lli - skrn llig ̇ sul llan g ̇ - lɛhd amzwaru .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: nssn lus ̣ it nna - illan f - lwrt is - ur - z ̣ d ̣ arn ad - srs - skrn mddn ard issann is - immut g ̇ walli yus ̣ s ̣ an f - lwrt .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: ašku lus ̣ it ur - tgi yat mah ̣ dd sul iddr bab l - lus ̣ it . ur - ra - srs - skrn mddn ard immt .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: mayan a - f - d - iqqan ula lɛhd n - rbbi amzwaru a - izga s - idammn l - lmut .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: llig ̇ ikmml musa iwaliwn - ns lli - s - yus ̣ s ̣ a kullu mddn - ns f - lus ̣ iyat n - ššrɛ , yawi idammn n - imugayn ula win - wag ̇ ad ̣ n izayd - asn aman , yasi tis ̣ t ̣ t ̣ win n - uzukkʷni yass - tnt s - tad ̣ ut iz ̣ ggʷag ̇ n , irušš srsn arra n - ššrɛ ula mddn kullutn

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: yini - asn : « idammn - ad a - izzgan lɛhd lli - f - kʷn - yus ̣ s ̣ a rbbi a - srs - tskarm . »

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: izayd ar - itrušš ah ̬ iyyam s - idammn ula kullu irukutn lli - s - a - gis - tɛbadn mddn .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - iga ššrɛ , iqqan - d kraygatt kra - illan a - itg ̇ us s - urušš n - idammn . idrus ma - ur - itg ̇ usn g ̇ mkan . ig ̇ - ur - ffin idammn , ur - ra - tittin ddnub .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - s - d - iqqan a - tg ̇ usnt - tg ̇ awsiwin - an , wah ̬ h ̬ a ur - gint g ̇ ir amalu irwasn ma - illan g ̇ - ignna . walaynni iqqan - d tig ̇ awsiwin n - ignna ad - g ̇ usnt s - kra n - tg ̇ rsi yufn h ̬ tin .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: ašku lmasih ̣ ur - ikšim s - th ̣ anut tamz ̣ layt lli - ityawskarn s - ifassn n - bnadm , tg g ̇ ir amalu n - talli illan g ̇ - ignna . walaynni s - ignna a - s - ikšm ntta , yili gis g ̇ ilad , ibidd f - ssibt - nng ̇ g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: nssn is - a - ikššm - unmg ̇ ur ihiyyan n - ayt - yudaya kraygatt asggʷas s - th ̣ anut ityawqdasn , ar - dids - itawi idammn lli - ur - ginin wins . imma lmasih ̣ , urd kigan d - twaliw a - ikšm s - ignna a - n - isrs ih ̬ f - ns .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: ašku ur - t - id - iqqan a - immt kigan d - twaliw zg ̇ - llig ̇ ttyawh ̬ laq ddunit . walaynni yat - twal a - d - yuška g ̇ - isiggʷra n - ddunit , baš a - immt issitti ddnub f - bnadm .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: iqqan - d kullu mddn ad - mmtn yat - twal , lkmn ilmma lh ̣ ukm .

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: g ̇ mkan a - s - ifka lmasih ̣ ula ntta ih ̬ f - ns yat - twal baš a - yasi ddnub n - mddn ggutnin . ra - d - iwrri tis snat - twal , urd baš a - yasi ddnub walaynni baš a - ijjnjm kullu winna srs tqlnin rjun - in gis .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: imma ššrɛ n - ayt - yudaya iga g ̇ ir zund amalu l - lbarakat lli - ra - yili . ur - iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - d - issbayyn lbarakat - an g ̇ mklli gant . ašku ššrɛ ur - iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - issg ̇ us s - usg ̇ us ikmmln g ̇ willi - n - bdda - ssakmurnin tig ̇ rsiw i - rbbi asggʷas ar asggʷas .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: mrad is - wrrin g ̇ usn g ̇ willi tɛbadnin g ̇ mkan , ikun ur - sul - a - ssh ̣ ssan is - a - gisn - tqaman ddnub ula - da - ttirin a - tzayadn ar - n - ssakmurn tig ̇ rsiw yad ̣ ni .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: walaynni tig ̇ rsiw - an , ntnti a - tn - d - itraran ad - swingimn g ̇ - ddnub - nsn asggʷas ar asggʷas ,

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: ašku ur - z ̣ d ̣ arn idammn n - imugayn d - wag ̇ ad ̣ n ad - ssittin ddnub .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: mayan a - f - inna lmasih ̣ g ̇ akud llig ̇ ra - d - yašk s - ddunit : « tig ̇ rsiw d - twafkiw , ur - a - tnti - ttirit walaynni tqs ̣ adt gigi yat - ddat .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: lbhaym tyawjdarnin ula atig n - ddnub , ur - a - srsn - ttrd ̣ ut ,

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: walaynni nnig ̇ - ak ‹ ha - yyi uškig ̇ - d ad - skrg ̇ ma - trit a - rbbi , g ̇ mklli flla ityaran g ̇ - warra - nnk . › »

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: g ̇ mkan a - s - imla rbbi is - ur - a - ittiri tig ̇ rsiw ula tiwafkiw ula lbhaym tyawjdarnin ula atig lli - akkan mddn f - ddnub - nsn . ur - a - srsn - itrd ̣ u , wah ̬ h ̬ a da - yas - tn - in - ssakmurn mddn g ̇ mklli ittini ššrɛ .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: izayd ilmma lmasih ̣ yini « ha - yyi uškig ̇ - d ad - skrg ̇ ma - trit . » g ̇ mkan a - s - issunf kullu tig ̇ rsiw timzwura baš a - izzga tig ̇ rsi yad ̣ ni .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: llig ̇ iskr yasuɛ lmasih ̣ maylli gis ira rbbi , isrs - n yat - twal g ̇ - lgddam - ns tig ̇ rsi lli - igan ddat - ns . g ̇ mkad a - s - ag ̇ - issg ̇ us nkkʷni zg ̇ - ddnub - nng ̇ .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: ass f - wass ar - tbddadn inmg ̇ urn n - ayt - yudaya ar - skarn tawuri - nsn , ar - n - ssakmurn kigan d - tg ̇ rsiw lli - ur - z ̣ d ̣ arnin ad - ssittint ddnub .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: imma lmasih ̣ , yat - twal a - n - isrs yat - tg ̇ rsi f - ddnub n - kullu tasutin , iskiws ilmma f - ufasi n - rbbi

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: ar - itql ard ig rbbi kullu inuwwašn - ns g ̇ - ddu id ̣ arn - ns .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: ašku s - yat - tg ̇ rsi a - s - issg ̇ us imz ̣ layn n - rbbi s - usg ̇ us ikmmln lli - ur - sar - itmmin .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: ula rruh ̣ lqudus ifka - yag ̇ tugga f - mayad inna :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: « sidi rbbi a - innan ‹ g ̇ mkad a - iga lɛhd lli - rad - didsn - skrg ̇ g ̇ - uwssan - an . ra - n - arag ̇ tinbad ̣ in - inu f - uwlawn - nsn , gg ̇ - tnt g ̇ - ih ̬ fawn - nsn . › »

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: izayd ilmma yini : « ur - sul - rad - d - ktig ̇ ddnub - nsn ula lh ̬ ʷšanat lli - skrn . »

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - imla is - fllanng ̇ - issitti lmasih ̣ kullu ddnub lli - nskr . ur - ag ̇ - sul - ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a a - n - nssakmur kra n - tg ̇ rsiw yad ̣ ni .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: f - mayan a - f - rad - awn - inig ̇ ay - aytma , nz ̣ d ̣ ar a - nkšm g ̇ ilad s - zzɛamt s - ‹ th ̣ anut ityawqdasn › f - ssibt n - idammn n - yasuɛ .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: ašku s - lmut - ns a - s - ag ̇ - ijjujad yan - ug ̇ aras l - ljdid lli - itawin s - tudrt , a - srs - nzri zg ̇ - lh ̬ amiya s - ugʷns .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: llig ̇ - ag ̇ - illa yan - unmg ̇ ur ihiyyan lli - itgabaln mddn n - rbbi ,

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: illa fllanng ̇ a - n - nakmur s - rbbi s - nniyt ikmmln , namn rad - ag ̇ - iqbl , ng ̇ us zg ̇ - kullu ddnub lli - s - a - issh ̣ ssa - uwl n - bnadm , tarud ula ddat - nng ̇ s - waman g ̇ usnin .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: illa fllanng ̇ a - namz ̣ g ̇ - rrja lli - s - numn bla - yas - nrz ̣ m , ašku rbbi lli - ifkan awal - ns rad - bdda - gis - izga .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: illa fllanng ̇ a - stt - ntawi g ̇ - ingratnng ̇ baš a - ntmɛawan a - nissan mamnk a - nth ̣ nnu ar - nskar kullu ma - ifulkin .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: a - ur - nssikki f - umnaggar n - ingratnng ̇ g ̇ mklli skarn kra n - mddn , walaynni a - nzzɛam i - ngratnng ̇ , g ̇ ilad s - uggʷar ašku ar - ttmnadm is - a - d - itakmur - wass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk siditnng ̇ .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: walaynni ig ̇ - nnkr ar - nskar ddnub tigira n - ma - nssn lh ̣ qq , ur - ra - sul - darnng ̇ - tili kra n - tg ̇ rsi ma - fllanng ̇ - issittin ddnub .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: han s - tksad ̣ ggutnin a - s - rad - ag ̇ - d - iqqan a - ntql s - lh ̣ ukm n - rbbi ula lɛafit itjhhdn lli - s - ra - ihlk kullu willi ffug ̇ nin zg ̇ - wawal - ns .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: nssn is - ur - irh ̣ im rbbi yan irurn tig ̇ urdin - ns s - ššrɛ n - musa , ašku iqqan - t - id a - immt f - tugga n - sin ng ̇ d krad ̣ inagan .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: walaynni uggʷar l - lɛqubit - an a - ra - yili i - wanna yud ̣ d ̣ rn yus n - rbbi s - id ̣ arn - ns , ih ̣ gr idammn l - lɛhd lli - t - issg ̇ usn , irgm rruh ̣ n - rrh ̣ mt .

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: ašku nssn izd rbbi a - innan : « nkki a - rad - asn - irar f - mad - skrn , fkg ̇ - asn mad - asn - igan . » yini - dag ̇ : « rbbi siditun ra - yut lh ̣ ukm f - mddn - ns . »

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: han tiksad ̣ iggutn a - ra - yili i - wanna id ̣ rn g ̇ - ufus n - rbbi lli - iddrn .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: swangmad - d ussan imzwura lli - g ̇ - twrrim tsfawm s - tifawt l - lmasih ̣ , ts ̣ brm tzgam g ̇ akud llig ̇ a - tkkatm tammara išqan .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: kra n - izmaz ar - fllawn - zraynt - trggam d - trfufnt g ̇ - lgddam n - mddn . izmaz yad ̣ ni ar - ttbddadm d - willi - f - a - zraynt .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: ar - ttɛawanm aytmatun lli - n - llanin g ̇ - lh ̣ bs , ts ̣ brm d - willi - awn - kkisnin ayda - nnun , tfrh ̣ m ašku tssnm is - tet ̣ t ̣ afm kra yufn mayan , a - t - igan d - wayda idumn .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: imma g ̇ ilad , a - ur - di - twrrim f - zzɛamt - an gigun illan , ašku rad - awn - gis - tili lbaraka iggutn .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: ih ̬ s ̣ s ̣ a - kʷn a - ts ̣ brm ard tkmmlm kullu ma - gigun - ira rbbi , tkšmm tigira s - maylli - s - awn - inna rad - awn - yili .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: ašku inna : « yan imikk ra - d - iruh ̣ g ̇ walli ra - d - yašk , ur - ra - n - imat ̣ l .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: skarat afulki g ̇ - gr - willi ur - ssinnin rbbi . wah ̬ h ̬ a ig ̇ - a - gigun - rggmn rad - z ̣ rn is - ifulki kullu ma - tskarm , inin ilmma izd rbbi ad - dar lh ̣ qq g ̇ - wass lli - g ̇ - ra - d - yašk a - yut lh ̣ ukm .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :

text2: nttan a - yusin ddnub - nng ̇ g ̇ - ddat - ns f - uggjdi , baš a - nmmt i - ddnub nddr i - ma - ird ̣ an rbbi . s - tiggas - ns a - s - tjjim .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: g ̇ ayd izrin tjlam zund ulli , imma g ̇ ilad twrrim - d s - dar - umksa lli - itgabaln ulawn - nnun .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: ašku ra - iz ̣ r mamnk a - ig ̇ us - uwl - nnm s - luqr iggutn .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: imma g ̇ ilad rad - awn - inig ̇ , a - kullu - tgm yan g ̇ - ma - tswingimm ula ma - s - a - tssh ̣ ssum , ar - tth ̣ ubbum i - ngratun s - tayri n - aytmatn , ar - di - ttadrm i - ih ̬ f - nnun ar - tth ̣ nnum i - ngratun .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: ig ̇ - illa mad - awn - iskrn kra yʷh ̬ šnn , ad - as - ur - trarm s - lh ̬ ʷšant . ig ̇ - illa ma - kʷn - irgmn , ad - as - ur - trarm s - trggam , walaynni iniyat - as : « a - k - ibark rbbi . » ašku ig ̇ ra - yawn - d rbbi ad - awn - tili lbaraka .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: illa fllas a - ifl kullu kra igan lh ̬ ʷšant ar - iskar afulki , ar - isiggil s - sslamt ar - gis - itazzal .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: ašku siditnng ̇ ar - itgabal g ̇ willi - f - ird ̣ a , ar - isflid i - mad - as - ttinin . imma g ̇ willi skarnin ma - yʷh ̬ šnn , ar - tn - itd ̣ ad ̣ d ̣ a . »

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: manwa ra - kʷn - issrfufn ig ̇ - tram a - tskarm afulki ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: arag ̇ - awn - in a - iɛyyaln , ašku tnram iblis . arag ̇ - awn - in a - tarwa , ašku tssnm babatnng ̇ . arag ̇ - awn - in a - id - babatsn , ašku tssnm g ̇ walli illan zg ̇ - isizwar . arag ̇ - awn - in a - iɛyyaln , ašku tdusm izga - gigun - wawal n - rbbi tnrum iblis .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: a - ur - ttirim ddunit ula kra illan g ̇ - ddunit . ig ̇ - a - ittiri yan ddunit , ur - gis - tlli tayri n - rbbi babatnng ̇ .

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: ašku kullu ma - illan g ̇ - ddunit ( iga g ̇ aylli ttiri ddat , ula g ̇ aylli ttiri tit ̣ , ula g ̇ aylli - s - a - issimg ̇ ur bnadm ih ̬ f - ns ) , urd babatnng ̇ a - d - ikka walaynni ikka - d ddunit .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: ar - tzray ddunit ula kullu ma - gis - ttirin mddn , imma yan iskarn s - ma - ira rbbi , ra - iddr tudrt idumn .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: wa - tarwa ɛzzanin , tasaɛt iggʷran ayad . tsfldm kunni f - unuwwaš l - lmasih ̣ lli - ra - d - yašk . hati g ̇ ilad uškan - d kigan d - inuwwašn l - lmasih ̣ . g ̇ ayan a - f - nssn izd tasaɛt iggʷran ayd ilkmn .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: ffug ̇ n ntni zg ̇ - darnng ̇ walaynni urd zg ̇ - ginng ̇ a - zg ̇ - gan . mrad is - zginng ̇ - gan ikun didnng ̇ qaman , walaynni nssn kullutn ur - gin zg ̇ - ginng ̇ , ašku ffug ̇ n zg ̇ - darnng ̇ .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: kunni tssnm lh ̣ qq kullukn , ašku illa gigun rruh ̣ lli - awn - ifka g ̇ walli igan amz ̣ lay n - rbbi .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: mayad a - f - awn - in - urig ̇ , ašku tssnm lh ̣ qq , urd zund ig ̇ - ur - ti - tssinm , ašku ur - jju - d - uškint kra n - tkrkas zg ̇ - lh ̣ qq .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: manwa igan bu - tkrkas ? iga - t wanna innan « yasuɛ ur - igi lmasih ̣ n - rbbi . » yan innan g ̇ mkan , iga anuwwaš l - lmasih ̣ , irar tig ̇ urdin - ns s - rbbi babatnng ̇ ula s - yus .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: ašku yan irurn tig ̇ urdin - ns s - yus n - rbbi , irur - tt ula s - rbbi babatnng ̇ . imma yan ittirin yus n - rbbi , ar - ittiri ula rbbi babatnng ̇ .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: zgayat - bdda g ̇ - maylli mi tsfldm g ̇ - isizwar . g ̇ mkan a - s - rad - bdda - tzgam g ̇ - rbbi babatnng ̇ ula g ̇ - yus .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: ašku s - wawal izgan a - s - ag ̇ - imla mayad , yini - ag ̇ is - rad - ag ̇ - ifk tudrt idumn .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: urig ̇ - awn - in tig ̇ awsiwin - ad f - willi ranin a - kʷn - jllun .

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: imma kunni , illa - bdda gigun rruh ̣ lli - awn - ifka lmasih ̣ . ur - th ̣ tajjam ma - kʷn - isslmadn , ašku rruh ̣ - ns ar - kʷn - isslmad f - kraygatt kra , ar - awn - imala lh ̣ qq bla tikrkas . walaynni illa fllawn a - gis - tzgam g ̇ mklli - awn - isslmad .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: imma g ̇ ilad a - tarwa ɛzzanin , zaydat tzgam g ̇ - lmasih ̣ , baš a - izɛm - uwl - nng ̇ g ̇ akud nna - d - iwrri ibayyn - d , ur - ra - niri a - zgis - nrgs .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: tssnm is - iskr lmasih ̣ kullu ma - ird ̣ an rbbi , tissanm is - iwrri ilul kraygatt yan iskarn ma - t - ird ̣ an s - tlalit l - ljdid zg ̇ - dar rbbi .

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: z ̣ rat matta g ̇ unška - s - ag ̇ - ira rbbi babatnng ̇ ayllig ̇ - ag ̇ - iga d - tarwa - ns . ašku g ̇ mkan a - nga nkkʷni . mayad a - f - ur - tssin ddunit ma - nga , ašku ur - tssin rbbi .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , nga tarwa n - rbbi g ̇ ilad . ur - ta - yag ̇ - issbayyn ma - ra - ng g ̇ - mayd - d - iftan , walaynni nssn mayad : g ̇ akud llig ̇ ra - d - yašk lmasih ̣ ra - ng zund nttan , ašku ra - t - nz ̣ r g ̇ mklli iga .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: kullu wanna dar rrja - yad g ̇ - lmasih ̣ ar - issg ̇ us ul - ns g ̇ mklli ig ̇ us ntta .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: kraygatt yan iskarn ddnub , hati iffug ̇ zg ̇ - ššrɛ n - rbbi , ašku ddnub a - igan uffug ̇ n - ššrɛ .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: tssnm kunni is - d - yuška lmasih ̣ baš a - fllanng ̇ - issitti ddnub - nng ̇ , tissanm is - ur - jju - iskir kra n - ddnub ntta .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: wanna izgan g ̇ - lmasih ̣ ur - a - iskar ddnub . imma wanna itzayadn g ̇ - ddnub ur - ta - ifhim ula issn mamnk a - iga lmasih ̣ .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: wa - tarwa ɛzzanin , a - ur - tadjm yan a - kʷn - ijllu . wanna iskarn s - lh ̣ qq , ra - srs - ifrh ̣ rbbi g ̇ mklli ifrh ̣ s - lmasih ̣ .

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: imma wanna iskarn ddnub , win iblis a - iga , ašku iblis ar - iskar ddnub zg ̇ - isizwar . mayad a - f - d - yuška yus n - rbbi : yuška - d a - ihlk iskkirn n - iblis .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: imma wanna - d - iluln talalit l - ljdid zg ̇ - dar rbbi , ur - a - iskar ddnub , ašku rbbi iz ̣ z ̣ a gis amud - ns . ur - iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - izayd g ̇ - ddnub , ašku iwrri iga zg ̇ - tarwa n - rbbi .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - a - ntissan tarwa n - rbbi zg ̇ - tarwa n - iblis : wanna ur - iskarn s - lh ̣ qq ur - igi win rbbi , d - wanna ur - ith ̣ nnun g ̇ - gʷmas ur - igi win rbbi .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - iga - wawal lli - mi - tsfldm zg ̇ - isizwar : illa fllanng ̇ a - nttiri i - ngratnng ̇ .

text: Not as Cain , who was of that wicked one , and slew his brother . And wherefore slew he him ? Because his own works were evil , and his brother ' s righteous .
text2: a - ur - ng zund qayn lli - igan win iblis ing ̇ gʷmas . mah ̬ ayllig ̇ - t - ing ̇ a ? ašku qayn ar - iskar ma - yʷh ̬ šnn , imma gʷmas ar - iskar ma - ifulkin .

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: way - aytma , a - ur - ttɛjjabm ig ̇ - kʷn - kurhan ayt - ddunit .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: walaynni nssn is - nzri nkkʷni zg ̇ - lmut s - tudrt , ašku tlla ginng ̇ tayri n - aytmatnng ̇ . walaynni yan ur - ittirin aytmas , hati sul iqama g ̇ - lmut .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: yan ikurhan gʷmas , iga zund ig ̇ - t - ing ̇ a . d - wanna ing ̇ an , ur - akkʷ - rad - as - tili tudrt idumn .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - nssn mamnk a - tga lh ̣ nant : lmasih ̣ ifka ih ̬ f - ns f - ssibt - nng ̇ . imma nkkʷni , illa fllanng ̇ a - nakka ih ̬ f - nng ̇ f - ssibt n - aytmatnng ̇ .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: ig ̇ - illa yan it ̣ t ̣ afn lh ̬ ir iz ̣ r gʷmas ih ̣ tajja walaynni issiqar fllas ul - ns , mamnk a - ra - yini tlla gis lh ̣ nant n - rbbi ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: wa - tarwa ɛzzanin , a - ur - nmala lh ̣ nant g ̇ ir s - iwaliwn ula s - ils walaynni s - iskkirn d - lh ̣ qq .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ra - nissan is - nga win lh ̣ qq nsshnnu ul - nng ̇ g ̇ - lgddam n - rbbi ig ̇ - a - itg ̇ uwd ̣ - uwl - nng ̇ f - ssibt n - ma - ur - nfulki .

text: For if our heart condemn us , God is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
text2: ašku rbbi imqqur f - uwl - nng ̇ , yissan kullu ma - ginng ̇ - illan .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , ig ̇ - ur - ig ̇ uwd ̣ - uwl - nng ̇ , nz ̣ d ̣ ar a - nzɛm g ̇ akud nna - ntakmur s - rbbi

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: namz ̣ dars aynna zgis nd ̣ alb , ašku ar - nskar s - ma - f - ag ̇ - yus ̣ s ̣ a ula s - ma - t - ird ̣ an .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - tga lus ̣ it - ns , yini - ag ̇ a - namn s - ism n - yus yasuɛ lmasih ̣ , ar - nth ̣ nnu i - ngratnng ̇ g ̇ mklli - s - ag ̇ - yus ̣ s ̣ a lmasih ̣ .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: wanna iskarn s - lus ̣ iyat - ns , nttan a - izgan g ̇ - rbbi izga rbbi gis . g ̇ mkad a - s - nssn is - ginng ̇ - izga , ašku ifka - yag ̇ rruh ̣ - ns .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , a - ur - tamnm kullu wanna innan « illa - gigi rruh ̣ lqudus , » walaynni armat rruh ̣ - an a - tz ̣ rm is - iga win rbbi ng ̇ d uhu . ašku ggutn mddn lli - tkkanin ddunit , ar - ttinin is - a - sawaln s - mad - asn - imala rbbi walaynni ar - sskirkisn .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ra - tissanm izd rruh ̣ n - rbbi a - gisn - isawaln ng ̇ d uhu : ig ̇ - a - ittini rruh ̣ - an « yasuɛ lmasih ̣ yuška - d zg ̇ - rbbi , iwrri s - ddat n - bnadm » ra - tissanm rruh ̣ - an , izd win rbbi a - iga .

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: imma rruh ̣ nna - ur - ittinin lh ̣ qq f - yasuɛ , urd win rbbi a - iga walaynni iga rruh ̣ n - unuwwaš l - lmasih ̣ lli - f - tsfldm ra - d - yašk , illa - nnit g ̇ ilad g ̇ - ddunit .

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: imma kunni a - tarwa ɛzzanin , win rbbi a - tgam , tnrum - tn ašku rruh ̣ lli - gigun - illan yugʷr rruh ̣ lli - illan g ̇ - ddunit .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: ntni gan win ddunit , ar - sawaln s - ma - igan win ddunit , ar - srsn - sflidn ayt - ddunit .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: imma nkkʷni nga win rbbi , ar - srnng ̇ - sflidn g ̇ willi ssnnin rbbi . imma winna ur - ssinnin rbbi ur - rin ad - srnng ̇ - sflidn . g ̇ mkan a - s - ra - ntissan rruh ̣ l - lh ̣ qq zg ̇ - rruh ̣ n - tkrkas .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , illa fllanng ̇ a - nth ̣ nnu i - ngratnng ̇ , ašku lh ̣ nant tga tin rbbi . yan ith ̣ nnun , hati ilul - d zg ̇ - dar rbbi yissan rbbi .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: imma yan ur - ith ̣ nnun , ur - issin rbbi . ašku rbbi iga lh ̣ nant .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ag ̇ - d - issbayyn rbbi lh ̣ nant - ns : yuzn - d g ̇ walli igan yus s - ddunit , baš ad - ag ̇ - tili tudrt f - ssibt - ns .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - tga tayri : urd tayri lli - s - nra rbbi walaynni tayri lli - s - ag ̇ - ira nttan , ayllig ̇ - d - yuzn yus a - immt baš ad - ag ̇ - ifru zg ̇ - ddnub - nng ̇ .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: way - aytma ɛzzanin , llig ̇ - ag ̇ - ira rbbi g ̇ unškan , illa fllanng ̇ a - nttiri i - ngratnng ̇ .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: ur - jju - illi ma - iz ̣ ran rbbi , walaynni ig ̇ - a - nttiri i - ngratnng ̇ , izga ginng ̇ rbbi , twufa ginng ̇ lh ̣ nant - ns .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - nssn is - nzga g ̇ - rbbi izga ginng ̇ : ašku ifka - yag ̇ rruh ̣ - ns .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: rbbi babatnng ̇ yuzn - d yus baš a - ig anjjam n - ddunit . nz ̣ ra - t nkkʷni , ng fllas inagan .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: wanna ittinin s - nniyt n - uwl - ns « yasuɛ iga yus n - rbbi , » hati izga gis rbbi , izga ula ntta g ̇ - rbbi .

text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us . God is love ; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God , and God in him .
text2: nkkʷni nssn lh ̣ nant lli - s - ginng ̇ - ih ̣ nna rbbi , namn srs . rbbi iga lh ̣ nant . yan izgan g ̇ - lh ̣ nant , izga g ̇ - rbbi , izga rbbi gis .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: hati issuwfa rbbi ginng ̇ lh ̣ nant - ns , baš a - nsshnnu ul - nng ̇ g ̇ - wass l - lh ̣ sab , ašku nwrri nga zund ma - iga nttan g ̇ - ddunit - ad .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: lh ̣ nant ur - gis tiksad ̣ , walaynni lh ̣ nant ikmmln ar - n - ttluh ̣ tiksad ̣ s - brra . imma yan iksud ̣ n , ur - ta - gis - twufi lh ̣ nant ikmmln , ašku wanna iksud ̣ n ar - sul - iswingim g ̇ - lɛqubit .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: ar - nth ̣ nnu nkkʷni ašku rbbi a - izwarn is - fllanng ̇ - ih ̣ nna .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: ig ̇ - a - ittini kra n - yan « ar - ttirig ̇ rbbi » walaynni sul a - itkrhu gʷmas , hati ar - isskirkis . ašku ig ̇ - ur - a - ittiri gʷmas lli - itmnad , mamnk a - ra - yiri rbbi lli - ur - a - itmnad ?

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - tga lus ̣ it - ns : wanna ittirin rbbi , iqqan - t - id a - ittiri ula gʷmas .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: kullu wanna yumnn izd yasuɛ a - igan lmasih ̣ n - rbbi , hati ilul - d talalit l - ljdid zg ̇ - dar rbbi . kullu wanna ittirin rbbi babatnng ̇ , ar - ittiri yus .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - ra - nissan is - a - nttiri tarwa n - rbbi : ašku iban ginng ̇ is - a - nttiri rbbi , ar - nskar s - ma - f - ag ̇ - yus ̣ s ̣ a .

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: g ̇ mkad a - s - a - nmala is - a - nttiri rbbi : ar - nskar s - lus ̣ iyat - ns . ur - fllanng ̇ - iz ̣ z ̣ ay maylli - f - ag ̇ - yus ̣ s ̣ a ,

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: ašku kullu wanna - d - iluln zg ̇ - dar rbbi ar - itnru ddunit . mayad a - s - a - ntnru ddunit , ašku numn awal n - rbbi .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: manwa ra - inru ddunit ? wanna yumnn s - yasuɛ n - is - iga yus n - rbbi .

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: yasuɛ lmasih ̣ , nttan a - d - yuškan s - waman d - idammn . urd g ̇ ir s - waman a - s - d - yuška walaynni s - waman d - idammn . rruh ̣ lqudus a - yakkan tugga f - mayad , ašku rruh ̣ lqudus iga lh ̣ qq .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: llan krad ̣ inagan :

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: rruh ̣ d - waman d - idammn . mšaškand - d tugga - nsn .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .

text: For without are dogs , and sorcerers , and whoremongers , and murderers , and idolaters , and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie .
text2: imma g ̇ willi rkanin ra - n - qaman g ̇ - brra . gan - tn g ̇ willi skarnin ssih ̣ r d - willi tfsadnin d - willi nqqanin d - willi tɛbadnin ilahat n - ddunit , ntni ula kullu willi sskirkisnin ar - tfrah ̣ n s - tkrkas .

text: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches . I am the root and the offspring of David , and the bright and morning star .
text2: « nkki yasuɛ uzng ̇ - awn - in lmalak - inu a - iml tig ̇ awsiwin - ad i - imnaggarn n - aytmatn . gig ̇ az ̣ ur n - dawd gg ̇ agʷlas - ns . gg ̇ itri lli - isfawn zikk s ̣ s ̣ bah ̣ . »

text: And the Spirit and the bride say , Come . And let him that heareth say , Come . And let him that is athirst come . And whosoever will , let him take the water of life freely .
text2: isawl - d rruh ̣ n - rbbi ula taslit inin - as : « ašk - id . » wanna isfldn , illa fllas a - yini : « ašk - id . » d - wanna yag ̇ irifi , iz ̣ d ̣ ar a - d - yašk , isu zg ̇ - waman n - tudrt , kullu wanna iran bla ifka yat .

text: For I testify unto every man that heareth the words of the prophecy of this book , If any man shall add unto these things , God shall add unto him the plagues that are written in this book :
text2: awiyat - stt g ̇ - ma - rad - inig ̇ i - kullu wanna isfldn i - iwaliwn lli - d - issbayyn rbbi g ̇ - warra - yad : ig ̇ - idda yan ard - asn - izayd kra , rad - as - izayd rbbi kullu tigud ̣ iwin lli - ibdr g ̇ - warra - yad .

text: And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy , God shall take away his part out of the book of life , and out of the holy city , and from the things which are written in this book .
text2: ig ̇ - idda yan ard ikkis kra zg ̇ - iwaliwn lli - d - issbayyn rbbi g ̇ - warra - yad , rad - as - ikkis tag ̇ amt n - usg ̇ ar n - tudrt ula g ̇ - tmdint tamz ̣ layt lli - ibdr g ̇ - warra - yad .

text: He which testifieth these things saith , Surely I come quickly . Amen . Even so , come , Lord Jesus .
text2: isawl g ̇ walli - d - issbayynn tig ̇ awsiwin - ad yini : « lh ̣ qq ayad . g ̇ ir imikk ra - n - aškg ̇ . » amin . ašk - id a - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: a - tili lbaraka n - siditnng ̇ yasuɛ i - imz ̣ layn n - rbbi kullutn . amin .
